name: Juice It!
description:
2 minutes to make as much juice as you can!

You lose 50 points when you drop a fruit, be careful!

How to play:

WASD or LEFT STICK: Move the blender

LEFT/RIGH ARROWS or RIGHT STICK: Rotate the blender

TIPS:

F - Fullscreen

M - Music on/off

R - Restart

ESC - Pause menu
